[ti:Pray (Explicit)]

[al:Pray (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.35]Pray (Explicit) - Jessie Murph
[00:00.82]Lyrics by：Jessie Murph/Gabe Simon/Feli Ferraro/Jenna Andrews/Stephen Kirk
[00:02.58]Composed by：Jessie Murph/Gabe Simon/Feli Ferraro/Jenna Andrews/Stephen Kirk
[00:05.02]
[00:11.36]I thought I wanted love
[00:12.66]
[00:13.47]Till u showed me what it was
[00:15.02]
[00:15.95]I've never been colder
[00:17.50]
[00:18.39]All this weight that I shoulder
[00:19.80]
[00:20.58]It's blessing and a curse
[00:22.11]
[00:23.29]F**k the better it's only worse
[00:24.97]
[00:25.77]Wouldn't wish this on no one
[00:27.40]
[00:28.31]It's one hell of low one
[00:29.88]We going up we going down
[00:31.46]
[00:32.11]We could run it back we could work out
[00:34.29]But no
[00:37.12]
[00:39.88]Late at night going out my mind
[00:41.64]
[00:42.21]Praying that the sun don't rise
[00:44.46]Like no
[00:48.41]
[00:49.83]Waking up but wishing that you don't
[00:52.90]
[00:53.40]Ooooh ooooh
[00:57.56]
[00:59.27]It's something that I pray you'll never know
[01:02.98]Oooh oooh
[01:07.40]
[01:09.91]Up at night drinking liquor like it's water
[01:11.69]
[01:12.34]Wakin up knowing I'm somebody's daughter
[01:13.67]But I don't know a lot about my father
[01:16.54]Maybe that's the reason I don't do s**t like I oughta no
[01:19.51]I need some medicine
[01:20.42]This s**t my head is in got me
[01:22.07]Thinking questioning laying in this bed I'm in
[01:24.09]
[01:24.63]Up at night drinking
[01:25.41]Liquor like it's water
[01:26.77]Mabye that's the reason I don't do s**t like I oughta no
[01:29.09]Waking up but wishing that you don't
[01:32.33]
[01:32.88]Ooooh ooooh
[01:37.14]
[01:38.92]It's something that I pray you'll never know
[01:42.58]Oooh oooh
[01:47.01]
[01:48.09]You might love the highs
[01:49.45]
[01:50.22]But you ain't seen the lows
[01:51.98]
[01:52.48]You don't know the half of it
[01:54.89]And I pray you'll never know
[01:56.69]
[02:01.58]Waking up but wishing that you don't
[02:04.37]
[02:05.07]Wishing that you don't
[02:09.07]
[02:10.98]It's something that I pray you'll never know
[02:14.34]
[02:16.90]You'll never know
[02:17.82]You'll never know
[02:18.70]
[02:20.34]You'll never know
